BJUMP.original: Open the parachute and glide through the checkpoints.
BJUMP.translated: 打开降落伞通过检查点。

BJUMP.original: A parachute is now available in you appartment.
BJUMP.translated: 降落伞已送至你的公寓。

BJUMP.original: Use ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to look and press ~INPUT_MOUSE_LMB~ to jump.
Use ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ to move in the air. ~n~Press ~INPUT_SPRINT~ to activate parachute. ~n~Hold ~INPUT_MELEE_ATTACK1~ to view different cameras.
BJUMP.translated: 用~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~在空中移动。~n~按~INPUT_SPRINT~打开降落伞。~n~按住~INPUT_MELEE_ATTACK1~查看不同视角。

BJUMP.original: Jump off the ramp then press ~INPUT_ENTER~.
Base jump onto the moving vehicle.
Use ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ to move in the air. ~n~Press ~INPUT_MOUSE_LMB~ to activate parachute. ~n~Hold ~INPUT_NEXT_CAMERA~ to view different cameras.
BJUMP.translated: 用~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~在空中移动。~n~按~INPUT_MOUSE_LMB~打开降落伞。~n~按住~INPUT_NEXT_CAMERA~查看不同视角。

BJUMP.original: 1. Jump to blipped target~n~2. Jump to blipped truck~n~3. Free jump (default)
BJUMP.translated: 1、跳到目标位置。~n~2、跳到目标卡车上。~n~3、自由落体。(默认)

BJUMP.original: Use ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to look and press ~INPUT_ENTER~ to jump.
Open the parachute and glide through the ~y~checkpoints.
BJUMP.translated: 打开降落伞通过~y~检查点。
